properties.name: Clean Water Hub
properties.description: Mobilizing volunteers to track water quality in local creeks and streams.
properties.body:
The Clean Water Hub was the idea of the Izzak Walton League of America. As a team member of Viable I led the creation of a design system that could scale with the expansion plans of the League.

Each State and IWLA chapter have specific chemical and biological quality checks that change from ecosystem to ecosystem. I led the team towards a dynamic web form system allows program managers to create collection forms specific to their state and chapter.

I initiated the creation of an API-first application that allows hundreds of IWLA chapters to create web-based collection forms that are catered to their unique data collection needs.
properties.exit: I continue to work with the team at the Izaak Walton League to expand the platform with new functionality, our next phase begins in 2019.
